characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription: The Stormfather is a Splinter of the Almighty. He is also what is known as a Cognitive shadow and he's semi-sentient. He is the shadow of a god and a spren (i.e., he is the merging of Tanavast's Cognitive Shadow and the previously extant Rider of Storms spren).
